: You could run X11, tunnelled through y: yep, I am doing that already, all new applications that I spawn are running fine on this desktop
the question is, how do I get applicatiosn that are already running on my home machine to this desktop (at school)

: You want to pull the window of an already running application at a remote site into your current screen?  You can't. Unless you started the program in a VNC session at home, and you connect to that VNC server from school.
